title: Bug 5340 - Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When attempting to cancel the process of adding an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog closes immediately. Eventually, the exception list comes up despite the cancellation request. The cancellation request should be honored, causing the process to either stop or disable the cancel button. To achieve this, pass 'false' for the 'cancellable' parameter when calling 'ProgressMonitorDialog.run'.
